website_summaries.verdict: Those who don't have specific expectations about the aroma may find it worth considering – but it will get expensive for frequent users.
pros: Earns high marks for its light consistency
Has a dropper cap and glass bottle
Comes with a satisfaction/money back guarantee
cons: The bottle contains only .33 ounces, making it quite pricey
The smell may be too strong for some users

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product back in October to use in our Shampoos to prevent Lice infestation,, Last week I had a terrible rosacea flare up.. Nothing new for me but this flare up was out of control and nothing worked.. My girlfriend recommended me use Tea Tree oil mixed with a little Coconut oil.. Well I did and the next morning my Rosacea was 50% gone.. 2 days later 80%.. Of course I had some try skin but the bumps and redness had diminished .. Sorry for long review but I had to share! I have included before and after pics to show you all!
customer_reviews.author: crystal/Dark Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great for Acne Treatment
customer_reviews.text: The smell is a little strange but the effects are amazing. I read online that it can help treat acne so I gave it a try. Put on a small layer before you go to sleep each night and your skin will be spotless! After only three days of using it, my skin was soft and almost completely clear. I've tried almost everything else!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Cured the fungus on my toenail.
customer_reviews.text: I had a fungus on my toes and my doctor said you usually can't get rid of this fungus. I used tea tree oil and 3 months later the fungus is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Miracle
customer_reviews.text: If you pop a pimple (cause it’s tempting ya know) put some of the tea tree on a cotton swab and apply it on and the next day, you won’t “grow” a new pimple! It makes it completely flat and not red!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: The Best Nail Treatment when the $200 pills don't don't work.
customer_reviews.text: Very Strong, This is A First For me I bought this as a recommendation to help clear up tow nail discolor and in two days i have seen that it's working. I have spent many Dr visits and paid $$$$$$$$ for there pills but no luck. After years of living with this i had given up But read about a natural treatment and here it is. All i can say is it works and i have no side affects. P.S. Don't just buy any Tea Tree Oil as there are some out there that are not the real deal. I will be buying again from Healing Solutions. Just can't believe i now have clear nails.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Hunter 56

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Effective
customer_reviews.text: Tea tree oil does wonders! THE PROS: - Works pretty well for acne. I diluted a few drops within water (I think the standard ratio is 1 part tea tree, 9 parts water) in a roller ball, and would apply it to acne a few times at night before bed, after moisturizing. Usually 2-3 times would really do the trick! Pleasantly surprising. - Works for pain & feels refreshing. - So many uses! I also used it when shampooing. Works wonders. THE CONS: - Strong odor. Not a bad odor, but strong. - It would be nice if it came with a dropper! But seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: I have used tea tree oil on my face every night for a little over a year. It helps so much with my acne and redness that I get. I have only ever bought tea tree oil from the body shop from Ulta but I was running out and this had prime delivery. It smells like cheap gasoline. It felt greasy when I put it on my face. It is making me nauseous with how bad it smells. Tea tree oil does not smell like this, I don’t know what this is but it’s not worth your money! I am returning/ sending it back tomorrow. PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Came Broken
customer_reviews.text: My tea tree oil came broken in the package. The smell hit me in the face as soon as I opened the bag. I just assumed that it was extremely strong but upon further checking, I noticed it had spilled from the bottom of it all into my package. Now my other items that came with the oil are covered in the awful scent. I assume it would work as hoped but as I returned it and opted to purchase some in store I don't know for sure and just gave it 3 stars for scent, dispensability, and pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler B

customer_reviews.title: Smells like gasoline
customer_reviews.text: I have been using pure tea tree oil for years. I have tried lots of different brands so I know this smell isn't normal. It literally smells like gasoline. People have even commented to me about the smell of gas. Its going in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette Efstathiou

customer_reviews.title: My scalp acnes are gone mainly from removing a wool cap and cotton hat
customer_reviews.text: I used Acid Cider Vinegar to wash my scalp before shampooing. That soothed the itches on my scalp. Tea Tree Oil rubbed in with a small cotton square on acnes felt good. (I used two bottles of Tea Tree Oil.) But I can't attest of its effect of removing acnes. Rather, I feel that a change of my habit of wearing a cotton hat on every shopping to wearing an umbrella and removing a wool cap under a breathable light weight hiking hat attributed the main reasons for getting rid of the scalp acnes.
customer_reviews.author: A hiker

customer_reviews.title: Yes for 5 but not there yet.
customer_reviews.text: I have order and reorder this product...Product is very good, recommend to anyone. If is work in Alaska means works for any other states in US. Only issue I have, I am ordering usual 3 bottles and did orders at list 3 times. Each time I have 1 or/and 2 bottle/s leaking or/and open. That is the bam-bam deal. Why seller before packing not checking the bottles. Even if the seller resell and is already packed, I think is easy even with the plastic on, just get this thing tight, is all it takes and your customers will tell you THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: MyAlaska

customer_reviews.title: Trying for hair
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for package and delivery. Trying for hair. I will update the status later
customer_reviews.author: Rojan

customer_reviews.title: Foot fungus fighter!
customer_reviews.text: I will forever be thankful I found this product! I had been fighting off a foot fungus (picked up while traveling) and nothing would work. I tried over the counter products, and even prescriptions from my dermatologist. It always came back! Til I tried this. I apply it to the effected area. It’s been 1 week and the fungus is gone. 100% naturally!
customer_reviews.author: ana de la campa

customer_reviews.title: negative bad buy for me
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the cap to move to twist off. After getting a plyers to do so, then the brush/dabber was stuck.. Once pried up and off, I got the liquid on my hands and it stinks like a putrid smelling motor oil! Yuck, I can't get the stench off of my hands now with many hand washings. I certainly don't wish to put some drops of this in my shampoo? No way!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: wish I'd read the negative reviews first
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd read some more of the reviews before I bought this. It STINKS. Like, rancid. Definitely not good quality tea tree oil. There's not packaging date or best by date on the bottle. Just the lot number ALQ - QFHE Like most things bought on the internet, it's not worth the hassle to return. I will be throwing it out.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Use at your own risk!!
customer_reviews.text: Do Not Buy!!This product left my skin itchy, dry, irritable & burning!!! I usually buy NOW essentials tea tree oil which is awesome but it was going to take two weeks to receive & I didn’t want to wait. Big Mistake!!! I DON’T recommend this product !!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This product work for my little Yorkie and for me
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie developed a skin rash. I have very sensitive skin anyway. take him to the vet twice didn't help tried all the medicines and then I ordered this. As soon as I applied it to him he was relaxed and able to sleep for a couple hours. I rub it in palm of my hand and rub it on to him. I also got a little Sprite bottle of water and put a few drops in it so I can spray him throughout the day. then I come up with a bit of a skin rash and had tried everything so I tried this and it went away.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Does what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.text: I am in the Army and sweat a lot due to training. I bought this oil to use for my back and chest which has become irritated from what I assume to be all the sweat that gets trapped in and under my sports bra. I had hoped that it would clear me up and I am not disappointed. My back is completely clear after using this for a week, completely clear of bumps, and my chest is nearly there as well. Will continue to use and purchase again as needed. The smell is really strong and outdoorsy-like. My roommate hates it but I don't mind it. I love the menthol feeling it leaves on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: HMS

customer_reviews.title: NOT SORRY OR GLAD I BOUGHT IT. I AM "NEUTRAL" ON THE PRODUCT+
customer_reviews.text: HAVE PURCHASED FROM MY LOCAL HEALTH FOOD STORE IN THE PAST & WAS VERY SURPRISED AT THE SIZE OF THE BOTTLE, BEING SO VERY VERY SMALL. YES-I REALIZE THEY GIVE THE AMOUNT but I didn't really 'THINK' in what ever size they STATED. AND THIS DOES NOT SEEM TO BE HELPING MY ECEZMA THE WAY OTHER BRANDS HAVE. THIS IS WHY I GAVE 'IT' SO LITTLE STARS--AS I HAVE HAD GOOD RESULTS W/OTHER BRANDS & ALSO SENT ONE TO MY SON....
customer_reviews.author: Regena

customer_reviews.title: When this oil was first opened it smelled wonderful however, in just 2 days it started to ...
customer_reviews.text: When this oil was first opened it smelled wonderful however, in just 2 days it started to smell rancid. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Zarate

customer_reviews.title: Dandruff
customer_reviews.text: My husband has started using this for dandruff. It has actually helped more than any other products have that are made specifically for dandruff.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Discoloration
customer_reviews.text: I put it on my toe nail bed for a fungus situation i got going on (side of my toe nail) and I do notice a difference.What I Did is cut my whole side of my nail where I saw the fungus and start putting tea tree oil every night and I do notice my nail growing without the discoloration. We will see the final results in about 3-4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Tea Tree 100% Pure, Best Therapeutic Grade Essential Oil - 10ml
customer_reviews.text: No pamphlet or instruction on Dosage per Applications?. Hopefully, I will get a better perspective on this product. This product don't come with a glass dropper syringe. to count the droplet's. Has a pungent Oder. what is the dilution Ratio? and what can I use as a diffuse Liquid?. Clueless?. NO USERS GUIDE????? I will update my review after, I test out this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shihan

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival, empty! 😟
customer_reviews.text: The package was damaged leaked all over and bottle was empty. Worst part was the whole thing was sooooooo sticky, worse than duct tape sticky. Horrible. Opening it, glass broke more and I could have gotten cut. Strong smell was pleasant like tea tree oil is, but no product left in bottle!!
customer_reviews.author: reneeafleischer

customer_reviews.title: Broken applicator
customer_reviews.text: After twisting the cap off, the applicator stayed in the bottle, making it unusable. This company may measure quality by failure rate, my experience was 100% failure - one bought, one failed. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Norman

customer_reviews.title: It really does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had a bad nail on my big toe and it was not healing even though I cut it and added other products but nothing was working until I bought this oil. I've only used it for about three times and its completely cure.
customer_reviews.author: Gaudy Batres

customer_reviews.title: Great for new piercings
customer_reviews.text: Never used it before, bought I’m the hopes it wold help with acne. Haven’t noticed a huge difference, but probs don’t use regularly enough. What I have noticed is that it is great with my three new piercings i got: they were hurting, but then I put the tea tree oil on them and overnight they hurt less and the swelling went down. Not all the way, but quite a bit. Nice a cheap solution to keeping your ears good
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Blatchford

customer_reviews.title: Great for fighting acne!
customer_reviews.text: Tea tree oil smells strong, so prepare for that. Sometimes my eyes water when using it if my acne is close to them. BUT this stuff is really quite powerful. I use it dry out acne, reduce swelling from zits, or bring pimples to a head. If I put it on at night, it usually dries the acne out or draws it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works with my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help clear up my skin; I've been breaking out since entering perimenopause. I have sensitive skin and it doesn't bother my face at all. If the breakouts are widespread, I put the oil on a cotton ball and sweep it all over my face. It seems like It would be oily, but it absorbs quickly. It does smell to high heaven, so I only put it on at night. It does help the healing process, so I'll deal with the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy39Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Tea Tree Oil
customer_reviews.text: This Tea Tree Oil works for what I need, but it is not the highest quality oil I've purchased. It smells a bit off, and I had trouble with the dispenser, so I ended up taking it off and using an Essential Oil pipette instead. So, you get what you pay for. If you need high quality Essential Oils, I would recommend NOW instead. The shipping was very fast, and I appreciated this.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Dilute and don't forget to dilute!
customer_reviews.text: I threw this out because I can't stand the smell. I don't know if an allergic reaction occurred and I became hypersensitive to the smell. I didn't dilute it like a dumby. If I could do it over again, I would dilute it. But if it was between this and Manuka oil, get Tea Tree. Manuka smells bad already, but the smell will smell worse and worse! I threw both out.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Swindell

customer_reviews.title: #Worthit  AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This oil is nothing short of AMAZING 😉 I had a bad case of rosacea and I used this instead of taking a very strong antibiotic and it worked. I also got some kind of rash up by my hairline at the top of my forehead. I put this stuff on and gave it a good coat and BAM 💥 it was gone by morning. The smell is a little strong but I’ll take it to get these results. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Opened in shipment
customer_reviews.text: Sad to say this one opened during shipment. Due to COVID I will not be sending back an empty bottle since I won’t go into the post office and don’t have a printer. I ordered two different EO and only the tea tree opened. Sadly, seems like I’ll be out the $. The scent is great, the oil is awesome from what I felt in the bag lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for razor bumps/breakouts..
customer_reviews.text: I shave my head at least four days a week. I’ve had outbreaks of irritated skin on the back of my head. While getting my yearly exam done, I asked my Doctor about the condition, possibly getting a dermatologist appt. She recommended trying tea tree oil. Since using it, my skin bumps/irritations have calmed down, many disappeared. I will rate the longevity down the road. But for now, I am extremely satisfied with this product. I have it three stores for the smell only because my wife said it’s a little strong.
customer_reviews.author: BTR362

customer_reviews.title: How to us Tea Tree Oil safely!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this product in an effort to improve my rosacea symptoms and acne/acne scarring. Because this is 100% Tea Tree oil I highly recommend diluding it with a pure form of oil (organic olive or coconut oil should do) for every 12 drops of diluting oil add ONE drop of Tea Tree. Using the product this way will be safer for your skin and the oil will last you FOREVER.
customer_reviews.author: Julia M

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. I bought this one because I had been laid off work and didn’t want to pay the price for my trusted brand. I have another brand of tea tree I like a lot better. This one is way too strong smelling and smells a little dirty. I ended up throwing it away and going back to my trusted brand. It works fine though.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dailey

customer_reviews.title: #1 COLD SORE HEALER
customer_reviews.text: If you have a bad cold sore this is the answer to your healing process. It works, I used it 2-3 times a day. Ny sire was not healing at all but once I used this tea tree oil it healed with in 5 days. It took 15 days using other remedies to finally get relief with this magic oil. I just recently bought another bottle to have. I give this a A++ Fast delivery great company.
customer_reviews.author: trista4120

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tea tree oil. I’ve purchased it before. I use it to treat my acne. You can apply straight on the affected area or use in masks. The bottle cane in a plastic bag to protect any leakage. However, it’s very well sealed. In fact, I always have a little trouble opening it first. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: spilled oil
customer_reviews.text: When shipping envelope arrived, oil had leaked out everywhere. We had only a tiny bit actually in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ywallace

customer_reviews.title: Myriad of uses. All of them will make your life better.
customer_reviews.text: I use this on everything. I use it to treat my acne as well as my dandruff. I add about 10 drops to an 8 oz bottle of shampoo. I pair it with vitamin e oil and rub it on my face twice daily to keep breakouts at bay. It smells divine and it truly works. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KeeKs

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for quality tea tree oil
customer_reviews.text: This product was as described and a great deal relative to other brands of tea tree oil. I can’t speak to the validity of it being ‘therapeutic grade,’ but I use it on my face and haven’t experienced any issues—except that when I put it on my cheeks it irritates my eyes briefly. I think that’s normal for tea tree oil though, along with the strong scent. It doesn’t have a dropper, just a small opening, which I actually prefer. The glass jar feels sturdy and I’ve traveled with it without it breaking or spilling. I’m happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mischa Ramone

customer_reviews.title: Too painful skin tags gone in 48 hours
customer_reviews.text: Had two skin tags- one of my underwear line and one on my bra line -they were both very painful and getting more irritated every day. I put some on the tags and a dab on Band-Aids and put them over the tags and they were both gone in 48 hours
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Mick

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have psoriasis on my foot and I have tried EVERYTHING... medication (which I hate) prescription cream, OTC creams... and I must say, Tea Tree oil and another foot cream I have are the best treatment I have found. The tea tree oil alone gave me itch relief, the anti-bacterial benefits have helped allow the skin to heal. Using this with another cream has been an absolute game changer for me! Highly recommend! Also, I get migraines, and I rub just a little on my temples when I feel one coming on, it really reduces the intensity of the migraine, makes it more like just a headache. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amy L.

customer_reviews.title: Smells strong
customer_reviews.text: I put this in all the shampoos in the house and have used it for almost a month now. The smell is STRONG from the day it goes in until the bottle is empty. I originally used this cuz my daughter got lice and I wanted to pretreat any else getting it and nobody did so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Johnothan Hallman

customer_reviews.title: Worked as I needed
customer_reviews.text: I had a piercing bump, after four days of using this oil the bump is gone. Smells really good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Abby 🛍

customer_reviews.title: Help for a itchy scalp
customer_reviews.text: I like the way my scalp felt after applying the product. I am only using it every other night since tying to determine if I will have a reaction. Have use tea tree oil in the past to help with acne. I brought the product to use in conjunction with my Jamaican Black Castor Oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell bottle should last a while
customer_reviews.text: Came in on time as expected nice sealed up Packaging scent is really strong I use it for a diffuser to go throughout the house only need a couple drops really strong smell doesn't take long to fill up the rooms with the scent bottle should last quite a while considering the strength of descent which I don't mind like I said just to drop a two and a couple hundred mL of water
customer_reviews.author: Paul N.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm not new to tea tree oil. This is a great value for a product that is so versatile. I mix it into other oils for my hair and skin. It's also used in my homemade face wash. I'll gladly order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great Value..Repeat Buyer
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered and re-ordered this item. My edges are very thin to almost bald on one side. Using the tea tree oil with rosemary oil, black castor oil & peppermint oil has really made a difference. I put all of the oils together in an old Wild Growth bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Portia Price

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brand!
customer_reviews.text: This brand is great for skin! I’ve made this part of my nightly skin care regimen. I just mix 2 ounces of distilled water with 2-3 drops of this magic goodness and shake it up. I then use it as a toner, applying it to my face and neck with a cotton ball after washing my face. I let it soak in and dry completely first, following with my face serum and moisturizer. I’ve noticed it leaves my skin feeling clean, refreshed and smelling great! So far it’s improved my oily skin, lightened my acne scars and calmed down my redness. I will definitely be purchasing more when I run out! 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: small bottle
customer_reviews.text: This seems great. However, I packed it for a trip, and three quarters of it was lost, spilling from the bottle. It was likely my fault for not securing the top enough. I may reorder.But I will say this is a tiny bottle for the money
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described - works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived well sealed and wrapped. It’s easy to dispense and works exactly the way it should. We use it in the bath, in foot baths, and as an addition to shampoos. Great product, great price, and arrived super fast.
customer_reviews.author: JAH

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I just made a homemade tick and mosquito repellent yesterday which need tea tree oil. Have not yet used it, am anxious to see how it works when I take my dog for her next romp in the woods. Hoping I do not get eaten alive as I have when even wearing Off.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Good Oil for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I must admit, I really like buying from doTerra or Young Living because I am skeptical that cheaper brands dilute with a carrier. That being said, I can't always justify spending hundreds on oil every year either. If money were unlimited, sure I would, lol. This stuff smells great, works great and is just what I hoped for. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Osgood

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing!!!
customer_reviews.text: My tea tree oil has been handled and delivered well. On time, and a full bottle of pure tea tree. This provider on Amazon sells other types. I mixed mine with Peppermint oil and smells superior cologne this price. I get a lot of compliments bby wearing it on my neck and hands. Mixing the oils with hand lotion feels sensational and puts it on the skin well. The price is amazing and luckily is on Prime service. I recommend this seller to anybody willing to feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: 100# True Tea Tree
customer_reviews.text: Smells strong but that’s what’s good about this brand. 100% true Tea Tree. Works well in wounds, skin tags, warts. It’s great on infections and wounds to prevent any infection. You have to use True Tea Tree for it to work. Love this brand.
customer_reviews.author: lisa ann Wagner Farris

customer_reviews.title: Numb my skin
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this for acne and I know it says not to do direct contact into skin but that’s the only way I feel any sort of cleaning to my skin. I don’t think it’s burned me yet but you get use to the smell. It’s quite enjoyable now.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Quality oil
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a good product I just wish there were a little more in the bottle. I didn't use it for pain relief so I couldn't give a review but it smells really good in my humidifier
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hite

customer_reviews.title: Best life changer . So just give it a try !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a miracle to me. I have suffering for chronic halitosis for years . So i did some research abt homemade remedies for halitosis and come up with this tea tree oil . So first of all i start detoxing my gut and then adding some probiotic suppplements in my diet that helped me a lot . And for my oral hygiene i use the tree oil tea tree oil toothpaste and some aloe vera . And that works perfectly. No more halitosis and fresh breath all the time . Now im more confident when i talk around people . So this product combined with aloe vera gel and toothpaste changed my life . Im so grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Osiris

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% Authentic!
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy this product again. I have purchased tea tree oil for years and I will NEVER buy from this seller. This product is not 100% authentic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Legit but had a leak!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I love the smell but most importantly it was to get relief from a sinus infection. It has helped me and my kids so far!! It does go fast as I refill my humidifier at least twice a day (& I have one in the living room too, so 4x’s a day really). It’s legit Update: changed it to one because it had a leak!! Too expensive for it to all leak out while sitting on my dresser!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of my keloid on my nose piercing fast.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try to help with my nose piercing. I had a painful bump on it that was only getting worse. After about a week of using this and saltwater soaks, my bump and the pain were gone. I kept using the tea tree oil for weeks after just to make sure. I haven't used it in about 2 months I think, and my piercing is still fine. So it got the job done well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pimples,acne,and darkspots!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this is an honest response I'm not any bot or paid to write this review I bought this product and it has worked wonders.I applied this on my pimples and darkspots and by the 2nd or 3rd day they were gone.I suggest using a q tip to appy.However there was one thing I did not like very much which was the strong scent.But other than that it's an amazing product and would recommend getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Did the job.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one of those “essential oils” fanatics. Most of the claimed benefits are typically overhyped or not proven to be scientifically true. However there ARE certain positive effects to some of them such as tea tree oil. I use it to help heal pimples and it works pretty well. But it’s not because it’s “all natural” or anything to that effect. It’s just drying. Like, super drying. SO DON’T OVERUSE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstie M. Pham

customer_reviews.title: Seems dilute/weak
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am not happy with this particular brand. It isn't very potent- needed at least 7-8 drops of oil in my diffuser to even notice the tea tree smell, compared to just 2-3 of the other brands I have purchased in the past. Also it has an odd odor to it. Overall I wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Seems to Work
customer_reviews.text: Having some issues with my large toenails and read that Tea Tree oil could help. It has been about two weeks and looking good so far. I could see improvement after just three days. Really smells bad so do not put on if going on a date or to the doctor!
customer_reviews.author: N2WATA

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect. In 4 days it was gone
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up to use on a skin tag. Worked perfect. In 4 days it was gone. Great price, great product. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Clarice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keloid
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my keloid... It made it super red for about a week but today it finally started to heal! Don’t give up!
customer_reviews.author: miranda

customer_reviews.title: Sort of helps with mosquito bites
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the intent of helping my mosquito bites. It’s okay... it sorta works... helps a bit with the itching but not a fan of the product itself. It’s a bit hard to dispense and the smell is overwhelming. Don’t think this helps with acne either.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Feeling Fresh!
customer_reviews.text: I love tea tree oil! Although I'm not a fan of essential oils I know the benefits that tea tree oil has. I put some in my face wash, my shampoo, and my body wash and I have noticed my acne clearing up! I also love that it's 100% pure tea tree.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Ade

customer_reviews.title: ⭐Excellent for pulling!
customer_reviews.text: ⭐I used this oil to make mouth pulling, it helps remove the buildup without the need of toxic chemicals Here is the recipe: 4 drops teat tree oil 2 tbs of coconut oil 1 tsp of xylitol ⭐you do it every day for 10 minutes and you will have the cleanest teeth ever! Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: MediaBoxEnt

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smelled way different then other tea tree oils i've owned in the past from the same company. I wasnt expecting such a strange smell. It still worked effectively but man did it smell bad.
customer_reviews.author: dmelchiorre

customer_reviews.title: Great For Spot Treating Acne
customer_reviews.text: I got this product because I heard it was great for acne spot treatment and it truly is !! It reduces redness and inflammation overnight. Although at times it would leak through the ” dispenser “ but it really wasn’t too bad.
customer_reviews.author: celia flores

customer_reviews.title: Love it for my cystic acne!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this after research found Tea Tree oil helps with cystic acne. I can tell a huge difference in my skin after just a few days of using it. Smell is like typical tea tree oil. Comes out well on a cotton round to dot on my face. This also works for wart removals as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my wife. She uses it on her face and we both noticed the results. More clear face and shiny. But it has a strong smell that I like but my wife hates the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Rash Islim

customer_reviews.title: Great for teeth pain
customer_reviews.text: I add a few drops to my toothpaste when I'm having lite pain or sensitivity. Almost always takes the pain away. Of course it taste and smells aweful but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sac

customer_reviews.title: ... this product is that the dropper cap is completely useless. I have purchased other EOs with the same ...
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have about this product is that the dropper cap is completely useless. I have purchased other EOs with the same style of dropper cap and they drops come out quickly but you can still control the flow. This bottle however you can not. it comes out in a stream of product. if they were going to use such a poor quality dropper cap they probably should have just omitted it so that you could use a separate dropper.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Tree tea oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and the brand ! I have ordered it multiple times ! I tried another brand in the middle and did not like it . That is is why I am back to this one!
customer_reviews.author: Graziella

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell, but it still worked
customer_reviews.text: The scent of this product was... off. I still used it on my skin, which could have worked out very badly, but it kept my acne under control which is why I gave it 4 stars. I think I got used to the smell, but probably won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, she had lots of bug bites from working in the yard. Brings relief from itching. She uses it regularly and we ordered another bottle. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Ram Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Tried on skin tags-- did nothing
customer_reviews.text: Figured was worth a shot to try on skin tags. Used several times a day for many days and absolutely did nothing. Maybe works for other things or on other folks but not in my case.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Caruana

customer_reviews.title: Lecithin is very important to the human body
customer_reviews.text: Lecithin is very important to the human body, and it is also one of the important substances for maintaining life. The correct use of lecithin can effectively promote physical health. Whether it is a baby or an adult, it can be used with confidence. There are lecithin ingredients in many infant milk powders, which play a very good role in enhancing brain vitality and improving learning efficiency and work efficiency.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Tolerable aroma
customer_reviews.text: This is the only tea tree oil I can tolerate as far a smell. My compliments to the manufacturer and it helps itch relief for my dog and I so I shall invest in a larger bottle next time. This was a trial and it certainly was trial size. TY
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Not for my demodex
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my face that has real bad demodex mites. After 2 months of using it, did not work one bit!!!! Witch Hazel oil worked better than anything
customer_reviews.author: Rita bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great for Acne
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to clear up a few acne marks. Works well! Haven’t had breakouts since and is fading my past dark marks. Scent is awful but it’s tea tree oil lol. It’s expected. Overall great to use. Will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for piercings
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use for my cartilage piercing that was developing a keloid / hypertrophic scar and it has worked wonders in the first week of use! I wish I knew about tea tree oil for piercings sooner. Kinda disappointed in how small the bottle is for the price but I’m happy with the product itself
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Kills staph, expect slight sting sensation
customer_reviews.text: Very effective on a pesky staph infection, cleared right up even after having no avail with antibiotics and mupirocin, others complain about the scent but I actually think it's nice. Every bottle of tea tree oil is suppose to be different because the uniqueness of the particular tree from which it was harvested guarantees that bacteria cannot adapt and gain immunity to the oil as an entirety. This is why this natural oil is effective since it is diverse and variant from bottle to bottle. Reviewers that complain of inconsistency are uninformed, the bottles must be inconsistent for maximum effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Afraid to use it
customer_reviews.text: My bottle arrived as expected, BUT, the seal was broken. Being that could mean it has been tampered with, I am not going to use it. Waste of time waiting and money.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged and had leaked into seller’s plastic wrap. Unsure if cap was loose as I didn’t open it. There was a small hole in the bag. Photos show where leak had made written description bleed.
customer_reviews.author: RyanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Open and boxed in with food!
customer_reviews.text: Got it back with contents spilled and onto food. Lost nearly 1/4 of the bottle. Lid wasn't screwed on tight for one. And I don't like that Amazon boxes toxic items with my food. That shouldn't happen! It's a safety hazard and violation of osha!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good for breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about a week and a half, it’s hreat for breakouts, i pair this with salicylic acid or my Aztec clay mask since I’m having a very bad breakout currently. I put this on before bed and it helps minimize the pimples and with continued use it gets rid of it
customer_reviews.author: Rosie akam

customer_reviews.title: Works Miracles!
customer_reviews.text: I can't stress enough how great this works. Better than that, the price is awesome. I usually would pay double the amount, so I'd say this was a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: SpanishLady

customer_reviews.title: Spilled a lot of the oil!
customer_reviews.text: The product itself seems to be good. Like other reviews here the essential oil was not well packaged. A lot of the oil was spilled in the package and most of the label washed off. It was cheap and most reviews seemed good, but you still don't expect such bad packaging. Very disappointing. The packaging needs a lot of improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Takes the itch out of no see ums bites!!!
customer_reviews.text: I keep getting bit when I'm on my patio. I come in and use a tip to dab tree tea oil on the bites. Almost immediately the itch is gone and the bite goes away a day or two instead of continuing to be very itchy. I apply the tree tea oil a few times. It really works!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bu NO SAFETY LID
customer_reviews.text: This is a standard higher grad Tea Tree Oil. It DOES come with a "Dripulator" inserted in the neck of the bottle, but NO SAFETY LID, AS ADVERTISED!
customer_reviews.author: Zigfried

customer_reviews.title: but I feel better and symptoms and the appearance of the treated areas ...
customer_reviews.text: I am using it to supplement medication to kill a head and foot fungus. It has not disappeared yet, but I feel better and symptoms and the appearance of the treated areas are looking better! D.M. P.S. ALONG WITH THE TEA TREE OIL AND A PRESCRIPTION TO KILL THE PARASITE THAT I CONTRACTED IN MY GARDEN, I AM BACK TO NORMAL. THE TEA TREE OIL WAS GIVEN A THUMBS UP BY MY DERMATOLOGIST AND A SUPPLEMENT TO MY TREATMENT!
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for your gums.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I was told by a dentist it was good for your gums. I had a severe toothache with swollen gums around the tooth. After a couple brushing inflammation and toothache was gone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Boom crack
customer_reviews.text: I’m using the to help the healing process of my piercings and to avoid keloids . The smell is strong but it works like magic 👌 Update!: The bottle dropped and I didn’t see no cracks , went back the next day to use again and it was completely broken into two pieces ! Great price, great product, but I wish the glass was a little strong
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Smells like bugs spray
customer_reviews.text: This smells like bug spray. I spilt the bottle and am unable to return it but it’s not a good oil. I don’t understand why it has such high rating.
customer_reviews.author: Mtrivedi

customer_reviews.title: Does what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I used this alternating with two other products, using each a week at a time. I’ve done this for a year now and I am seeing results that I have not found in years of using other products.
customer_reviews.author: American consumer

product_meta.title: Tea Tree Essential Oil - 100% Pure Therapeutic Grade Tea Tree Oil - 10ml
feature_bullets: The most UNIQUE and AMAZING SMELLING Tea Tree on the market, in our opinion. If you are not ABSOLUTELY amazed, receive a full refund from the manufacturer, Healing Solutions, no questions asked!

SUPERIOR EXPERIENCE: If you are just trying our Tea Tree for the first time and you do not switch to it permanently as your new favorite oil the manufacturer, Healing Solutions, will refund your money, guaranteed.

PURE + RIGOROUS QUALITY TESTING & CONTROLS: Distillation facility is GMP, ISO 9001 and Kosher certified. Make sure ALL oils you buy have these qualifications * CHECK OUT OUR REVIEWS!! * In our opinion our oil is superior to organic and THE MOST RARE, BEST SMELLING, AND MOST THERAPEUTICALLY EFFECTIVE OF ALL Tea Tree (Melaleuca alternifolia)
Healing Solutions is SUPERIOR because it offers over 170 different oils for blending/pairing.
